mapper.insert: insert into member(member_nickname, member_name, member_id, member_pw, member_date, member_user, member_phone, member_mailauth, member_mailkey, member_email, member_address, member_warning, member_clean, member_zipcode, member_sigungu, member_img) values(#{memberNickname}, #{memberName}, #{memberId}, #{memberPw}, now(), 1, #{memberPhone}, 0, #{memberMailkey}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberAddress}, 0, 50, #{memberZipCode}, #{memberSigungu}, concat('store',ROUND(RAND()*3),'.jpg') );
mapper.update: update member set member_nickname = #{memberNickname}, member_pw = #{memberPw}, member_phone = #{memberPhone}, member_address = #{memberAddress}, member_zipcode = #{memberZipCode}, member_sigungu = #{memberSigungu} where member_num = #{memberNum}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = #{memberEmail}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NICKNAME = #{memberNickname}
select member_id from member where member_email = #{memberEmail}
select member_pw from member where member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.delete: delete item from item left join member on member.member_id = item.item_writer where member.current_state = 'Y'
